text: ham and cheese waffles they are a
perfect mix of sweet and savory and
we're going to show you how to make them
what I love about this recipe is it's
what my mom made for my brother and my
sister and me growing up it's how she
got to see breakfast for dinner
start with your dry ingredients first
flour baking soda salt sugar and baking
powder now we're gonna go with a wet two
sticks of melted butter don't skip three
egg yolks some buttermilk and one of our
secret weapons a bit of soda water it
lightens the batter up you can whisk
these together and then mix the wet
ingredients with the dry ones
now the other secret weapon is the egg
whites you're gonna beat them and then
you're gonna add them in the last second
fold them in but don't worry about them
all being completely mixed in you want
to put about a quarter cup or so of the
batter into each square I like to use an
offset spatula here to work the batter
into the corners of the machine now it's
time for a little ham and cheese here
I'm using Black Forest deli ham and aged
white cheddar but you could use any type
of ham even prosciutto and any type of
cheese you want okay we're good to go
all right these are ready nice and
crispy around the edges the way my mom
used to dress him up was a little bit of
butter and a lot of maple syrup there
you have it ham and cheese waffles it's
breakfast for dinner for this recipe and
thousands more go to bone Appetit calm
